description: Prosecutors say seven held at Charles de Gaulle airport tried to sell fake test certificates.
title: Coronavirus: Fake test certificate gang foiled at Paris airport
title_page: Coronavirus: Fake test certificate gang foiled at Paris airport - BBC News
maintext: The seven had been running an unlicensed business as luggage-wrappers, but that had suffered when passenger numbers crashed in the coronavirus pandemic, AFP news agency reported, quoting an airport source.
